body:
Fixes https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/13637

Python depends on libintl.h which is provided by the 'gettext' package, but adding 'gettext' as a dependency creates a cyclic dependency. It should be investigated further how to resolve this conflict. In the meantime this PR removes it because it hasn't yet caused any build failures to build without it.
title: remove gettext dependency from python
